_sText:
cs_homegrown  Created by: Robtronic

radar overview Created by: D4RKSL4Y3R

nav file Created by:  chizbone

This is another remake of cs_crackhouse,  minus most of its flaws, 
There are two Hostage Rescue Zones now, eliminating the strangle point
at the one HRZ. Game strategies are improved because there are three 
HR routes now not just one. There is a back door, and a basement 
with a sewer area now, which are the other two HR Routes. 
The wooden fence which was transparent to bots is now a brick wall.
There are 95 custom textures/models, and a radar overview place-painted
for enemy troop movement intell when bots are used. The nav file was tuned
for the fastest glitch-free play possible.... ( note Hostages can't use ladders
and have problems going up or down basement steps rescue the basement 
bots through the sewer and the upstairs bots anywhere upstairs)

Map will play very well with Deathmatch mod aswell.

If you downloaded the 2010 version of this map i suggest you delete it and download this one which has many improvements.
